Widget.name: Data Table
Widget.Description: This type of table displays N columns showing facet aggregation functions (these are defined in the Search Logic).

Option.name: Widget Title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no title is displayed.

Option.name: Destination page on click
Option.Description: Indicates the URL that must be accessed for a refinement option. If blank, you stay on the same page.

Option.name: Facet name
Option.Description: Specifies the facet to display in the row headers.

Option.name: Sort categories by
Option.Description:
Sorts the categories using the selected method. Selecting anything but 'default' impacts performance.
  • 'default' requires no processing.
  • 'shuffle', 'desc*', 'score*', 'count*' and 'range*' impact performance on the server side.

Option.name: Iteration mode
Option.Description:
Determines what data is displayed:
  • 'all' visits the first child of each node before processing its siblings,
  • 'leaves' iterates recursively, returning the end nodes,
  • 'flat' returns only the first level.

Option.name: Facet column title
Option.Description: Name of the column containing facet titles.

Option.name: Total column title
Option.Description: Name of the column containing facet totals.

Option.name: Display percentage
Option.Description: Displays the value as a percentage.

Option.name: Display title row
Option.Description: Enables the display of the "title" row.

Option.name: Display total row
Option.Description: Enables the display of the "total" row.

Option.name: JSP path to use if no results
Option.Description: If there are no results, the widget is either hidden using a trigger, or a message is displayed using the content of a JSP file.

Option.name: Force refinement for feeds
Option.Description: Forces refinements on the specified feeds.
